title: Volkswagen 's EU share : new-car registrations in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
Month Aug 18 has the highest Market share and Sep 18 has the lowest Market share.
The highest Month Aug 18 has 6.1 more Market share than the lowest Month Sep 18.

mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
The maximum Market share 12.7 is found at Month Aug 18 and the minimum is found at Sep 18 where Month is 6.6.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Month is 6.1.
The Month Aug 18 has the highest Market share, followed by Nov 19, and Oct 19. Down to the Month Sep 18 which is the lowest.
Overall Market share has grew over the Months.
Month Jul 19, and Nov 18 have a similar Market share that is 11.8.
The highest value 12.7 at Aug 18 is almost 1.15 times larger than the average value 11.05.
